RandomDeserializer<T> - Interface in it.polimi.se2019.server.deserialize
This is the interface for all of the deserializers, the deserializer has a very tedious job of creating the objects as we need them, This is necessary since gson cannot do this alone.

RmiClient - Class in it.polimi.se2019.client.net
The rmi client sets the rmi connection up, creates the client stub to pass to the server and in general handles all the incoming requests from the server to be passed to the client command handler and the request to the server to be outed through here.

RmiServer - Class in it.polimi.se2019.server.net.rmi

RmiServer() - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2019.server.net.rmi.RmiServer
Default constructor just initializes the commandhander map, this is used to assign the request to the correct command handler when we receive one.
RmiServer.RmiWorker - Class in it.polimi.se2019.server.net.rmi
This subclass is where a connection from the client gets handled, as we said earlier th clients first registers itself and gets assigned a uuid to be sent along each request.
